T02D2930:335b-0: @335b ` // khrus kyi cho ga'i rim pa bzhugs /
T02D2930:335b-2: # // sngon tshe bde gshegs pho brang spyan snga ru //
T02D2930:335b-3: gdug pa 'dul phyir rdo rje can gyis ni //
T02D2930:335b-4: rjes mthun phrin las khyad par gang bsgo ba //
T02D2930:335b-5: dam bcas phrin las de ni rjes dgongs la //
T02D2930:335b-6: de phyir bgegs dang log 'dren tshar gcad cing //
T02D2930:335b-7: 'gro ba 'di la rjes su gzung ba'i phyir //
T02D2930:335b-8: sdug bsngal nges bsal bde mchog 'byor pa po //
T02D2930:335b-9: khro rgyal khyod kyis de ring byin brlab mdzod //
T02D2930:335b-10: khrus kyi skyes bu la dang por bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi sngags lan gsum brjod pas bskrad //
T02D2930:335b-11: de nas rdo rje khu tshur gyi sngags lan bdun nam /
T02D2930:335b-12: gsum brjod pas bdug / de nas yungs kar la pra tsa ta zhes pa dang /
T02D2930:335b-13: dha ra dha ra zhes bya ba'i sngags lan gsum bzlas la gtor ro //
T02D2930:335b-15: byab pa dang bsrung ba rim pa bzhin du bya'o //
T02D2930:335b-16: de'i rjes la rdo rje go cha dang /
T02D2930:335b-17: bsrung ba chen po'i sngags dang phyag rgyas kyang rim pa bzhin du bsrung ngo //
T02D2930:335b-18: de'i rjes la snying ga dang spyi bor phyag rgya bsams la rdo rje gtug go //
T02D2930:335b-19: aom pra tsa ta ku pi ta sa sa ti /
T02D2930:335b-20: aukshi pi dha na dha ra ni /
T02D2930:335b-21: dha ra dha ra h'um h'um phat /
T02D2930:335b-22: na mo ratna tar y'a ya /
T02D2930:335b-23: na mashtsanda badzra kro dh'a ya /
T02D2930:335b-25: ma h'a bid dha ra tsa ya /
T02D2930:335b-27: dha ra dha ra ma h'a kro dha /
T02D2930:335b-29: sarba bighnam bi n'a ya k'an /
T02D2930:335b-31: pra ha ra pra ha ra /
T02D2930:335b-32: sarba dusht'an yantra ka ba ta na /
T02D2930:335b-33: bi n'a sha ya bhasmi ku ru da ha da ha h'um h'um phat phat /
T02D2930:335b-34: nirma tha nirma tha ma h'a kro dha dza ya dza ya /
T02D2930:335b-35: sarba dusht'an pa ri ka dzva la dzva la sv'a h'a /
T02D2930:335b-36: aom badzra dzva la n'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D2930:335b-40: sarba au pa dra be bhya:/
T02D2930:335b-41: sarba aa k'a la mri tyu bhya:/
T02D2930:335b-45: sarba du rni mi te bhya:/
T02D2930:335b-46: sarba tsita by'a ku le bhya:/
T02D2930:335b-48: aom badzra dzva la n'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D2930:335b-49: che ge mo sarba bighnam aa pa na ye sv'a h'a /
T02D2930:335b-50: sarba by'a dhi bhya: sarba au pa dra be bhya:/
T02D2930:335b-51: sarba aa k'a la mri tyu bhya:/
T02D2930:335b-55: sarba du rni mi te bhya:/
T02D2930:335b-56: sarba tsi ta bhy'a ku li bhya:/
T02D2930:335b-57: aom badzra dzva la na ye sv'a h'a /
T02D2930:335b-58: che ge mo sarba bighn'am raksha raksha sv'a h'a /
T02D2930:335b-60: sarba au pa dra be bhya:/
T02D2930:335b-61: sarba aa k'a la mrityu bhya:/
T02D2930:336a-1: sarba du rni mi te bhya:/
T02D2930:336a-2: sarba tsita by'a ku le bhya:/
T02D2930:336a-6: bsrung ba chen po rnams ni mi 'jigs pa gser gyi mdog can /
T02D2930:336a-7: gos dkar po gyon pa dbyig pa thogs pa'o //
T02D2930:336a-8: 'jigs pa thams cad med pa kha dog dkar mo ral gri thogs pa'o //
T02D2930:336a-9: gdul dka' ma ni gos dmar po gyon pa dkyil 'khor la lta ba'o //
T02D2930:336a-10: ma thul ma ni kha dog nag mo khro gnyer
T02D2930:336a-11: bsnyer ba smad g-yogs nag po gyon pa 'jig rten
T02D2930:336a-12: gyi khams rang gi 'od kyi snang bas 'bar bar
T02D2930:336a-13: byed pa dbyug pa thogs pa'o //
T02D2930:336a-15: phyag rgya ni thal mo khong stong du sbyar ba las /
T02D2930:336a-16: mdzub mo gnyis dang gung mo gnyis nang du bkug
T02D2930:336a-17: ste mthe bo gnyis dang srin lag gnyis mthe'u chung
T02D2930:336a-19: nam:sarba ta th'a ga te bhya:/
T02D2930:336a-20: sarba bha ya bi ga te bhyo /
T02D2930:336a-22: sarba th'a ham kham raksha raksha ma h'a ba le /
T02D2930:336a-23: sarba ta th'a ga te sphu na ni rdzas te h'um h'um /
T02D2930:336a-24: ta ta ta ta aa pra ti ha te sv'a h'a /
T02D2930:336a-25: rdo rje khu tshur gyi sngags la /
T02D2930:336a-26: aom badzra da ma da ma h'um sphot ya bhasmi ku ru h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02D2930:336a-31: bsrung ba rim pa bzhin du bya'o //
